name: Posting of notices
text: [§398-1.5]  Posting of notices.  Every employer shall post and keep posted notices clearly setting forth the rights of employees provided by this chapter in a form prescribed by the director in conspicuous places in every establishment where any employee is employed so as to permit the employee to observe readily a copy on the way to or from the employee's place of employment. [L 2009, c 48, §1]
